Texts.Chs: 在你照顾蜜蜂之前，你需要给它们建造一个家。试着先造一个^orange;小型蜂箱^reset;，因为等会儿你将会需要到它来安置你的蜜蜂们。
Texts.Eng: Before you take care of bees, you need a place to put them. Build an ^orange;Apiary^reset; for this.
The ^orange;Apiary^reset; is essential for a beekeeper. You'll likely want more than one. You need them to breed your little buddies.
